scripts.build: bun build --target=browser ./index.html --outdir=dist && cp og-image.png googlee4be4edff7cf1d5f.html apple-touch-icon.png favicon-32x32.png favicon-16x16.png favicon.ico dist/
scripts.dev: bun run build && npx wrangler pages dev ./dist
scripts.deploy: bun run build && npx wrangler pages deploy ./dist --project-name=speedup-video --branch=main
scripts.release: npm version patch && bun run deploy && git push && git push --tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") ./dist/index.html --title "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --generate-notes
